biocontainers.name: deepnog
biocontainers.summary: Deep learning tool for protein orthologous group assignment

biotools.summary: DeepNOG is a tool for protein orthologous groups assignment. Assign proteins to orthologous groups (eggNOG 5) on CPUs or GPUs with deep networks. DeepNOG is much faster than alignment-based methods, providing accuracy similar to HMMER.

bioschemas.name: DeepNOG
bioschemas.summary: DeepNOG is a tool for protein orthologous groups assignment. Assign proteins to orthologous groups (eggNOG 5) on CPUs or GPUs with deep networks. DeepNOG is much faster than alignment-based methods, providing accuracy similar to HMMER.
